properties.name: tdb.db.directory
properties.description: Indicates which directory to use for a TDB TripleStore, i.e. location of the database files

properties.name: rdf.fuseki.enabled
properties.description: Indictaes whether a Fuseki SPARQL endpoint server should be started up or not.

properties.name: bored.api.baseurl
properties.description: Indicates the external location, base URL, of the BoredAPI.

properties.name: wikidata.api.baseurl
properties.description: Indicates the location, URL, of the WikiData API.

properties.name: rdf.fuseki.port
properties.description: Indictaes whether a Fuseki SPARQL endpoint port to be used if Fuseki is enabled.
